title: User Profile and Settings UI
description:
Create Comprehensive User Profile Page

Build a user profile page that enables users to view and manage their account information, security settings, and application preferences.

Requirements:
- Display current user profile information (name, email, avatar, etc.)
- Implement profile information editing with form validation
- Add password change functionality with security requirements (current password verification, strength validation, confirmation matching)
- Include preference management section for user-configurable settings
- Provide clear success/error feedback for all update operations
- Ensure all changes are persisted to the backend
- Implement proper authorization checks to prevent unauthorized profile access
- Handle edge cases (empty fields, invalid formats, duplicate emails, weak passwords)
- Add loading states during save operations
- Consider accessibility requirements (keyboard navigation, screen reader support)

Components to implement:
- Profile information form (editable fields with save/cancel actions)
- Password change form (current password, new password, confirm password)
- Preferences panel (application-specific settings like notifications, display options)
- Avatar upload/change functionality (if applicable)

Security considerations:
- Require current password verification before allowing password changes
- Validate new password meets strength requirements
- Implement rate limiting on password change attempts
- Sanitize all user inputs before saving
